feature.label: PlatformKit Bundle
feature.description:
PlatformKit is a platform modelling and platform dependency management toolkit. It can be used to support development processes based on the Model Driven Architecture (http://www.omg.org/mda/). PlatformKit is a refactored version of CDDToolkit.
A case study on how to use PlatformKit can be found at http://ssel.vub.ac.be/ssel/research:mdd:casestudies
Visit http://ssel.vub.ac.be/ssel/research:mdd:platformkit
